thread.title: Soap Spoilers: Steph Scully accused of kidnap in Neighbours and Ed Sheeran makes appearance in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps -
thread.title_full: Soap Spoilers: Steph Scully accused of kidnap in Neighbours and Ed Sheeran makes appearance in Home and Away - Neighbours News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Sophie Dainty
title: Soap Spoilers: Steph Scully accused of kidnap in Neighbours and Ed Sheeran makes appearance in Home and Away - Neighbours Soaps -
text: Steph Scully's past will come back to haunt her on Neighbours later this month when she is accused of kidnapping Amy Williams's son Jimmy.Jimmy's vanishing act ties in with the reappearance of his troubled father Liam, but it's Steph who finds herself in the firing line when it becomes apparent that the youngster is nowhere to be seen.Although Paul, Kyle and Daniel are all quick to accuse Steph (Carla Bonner) given her history, Liam suspects that there is something more sinister going on as he admits to Paul that he owes a loan shark fifteen grand.Suspecting that Jimmy is probably being held in a plot to get ransom money, Liam urges Paul not to call the police and to instead pay back the cash that he owes.After Paul decides to do the right thing and call the police, Amy is horrified to learn that Liam's actions are the cause of her son's ordeal.Furious, Amy lashes out at Liam at the police station as she accuses him of endangering their son, but what has happened to Jimmy? © Channel 5Steph looks for Jimmy © Channel 5Jimmy is found © Channel 5What has happened to Jimmy? Neighbours airs these scenes on Tuesday, October 27 and Wednesday, October 28 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Neighbours star Carla Bonner is returning as Steph ScullyNeighbours to introduce female love interest for Steph ScullyNeighbours' Steph Scully to face a tough time on return: 'She wants to redeem herself'New Neighbours promo teases the trouble in store for Steph Scully on her returnNeighbours spoilers: Steph Scully's return angers Sonya and Lucas in new trailerNeighbours spoilers: Steph Scully is arrested for kidnap in tense new trailerNeighbours returnee Carla Bonner: 'I'll bring more old faces back to Ramsay Street'Read more Neighbours spoilers and newsOver on Home and Away, Ed Sheeran will make an appearance as the singer comes to visit his childhood nanny Marilyn Chambers.The star filmed a guest appearance on the soap earlier in the year, but an amusing twist will see Marilyn completely unaware of 'Teddy's' fame when he arrives in Summer Bay.With Marilyn making preparations for Ed's impending arrival, John has concerns about their musical visitor, suggesting that he may take advantage by staying at their house for weeks.Although Marilyn assures her husband that Ed is very well mannered and would never impose on them, nothing can prepare her for the attention that the singer receives when he finally arrives. © Channel 5Ed Sheeran arrives in Summer Bay © Channel 5Ed Sheeran arrives in Summer Bay © Channel 5Marilyn shows Ed Sheeran around Summer Bay As all the teens at the Diner recognise him immediately, Ed finds himself drowning in autographs as Roo points out to Marilyn that her little 'Teddy' is actually an international superstar. After Marilyn gives Ed a tour of the town, Matt tentatively asks Ed if he'd be willing to play a song for everyone. What will Ed say? © Channel 5 © Channel 5 © Channel 5Ed Sheeran performs at Angelo's Home and Away airs these scenes on Thursday, October 29 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Home and Away: Ed Sheeran to make guest appearance in soapEd Sheeran's Home and Away storyline is revealed ahead of his soap debutSummer Bay welcomes Ed Sheeran in new Home and Away trailerAlso ahead on Summer Bay, Phoebe Nicholson will find her relationship with Ash reaching breaking point as he struggles to cope with their complicated situation.Phoebe and Ash's new romance has been under strain ever since she discovered she was pregnant and was unsure of who the father was.To make matters worse for Ash (George Mason), Phoebe's ex-boyfriend Kyle appears to be a natural with babies due to his strong bond with his nephew Casey.As Ash starts to feel even more pushed out by the pair, he starts to wonder whether Kyle would make a better father than him after all.Later, during a tense discussion with Phoebe, Ash tells her that he knows she is hoping that the baby turns out to be Kyle's. Will Phoebe be able to ease his doubts or is this the end of the road for the couple? © Channel 5Ash is hurt that Phoebe wants it to be Kyle's baby © Channel 5Ash is hurt that Phoebe wants it to be Kyle's baby Home and Away airs these scenes on Monday, October 26 at 1.45pm and 5.30pm on Channel 5.Home and Away confirms a new pregnancy storylineHome and Away: Phoebe Nicholson to feel the strain as baby paternity is revealedHome and Away spoilers: Phoebe Nicholson gets some unexpected newsRead more Home and Away spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
